DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine whether uFSH effective safe treatment male patient severe oligospermia azoospermia .
DOC.brief_title: Clinical Research Effectiveness Safety Treatment Severe Oligospermia Azoospermia With uFSH
DOC.criteria: Male subject age 20~35 . They accord diagnostic criterion severe oligospermia azoospermia . They had'nt treat drug could improve sperm count quality one month observation，otherwise , elution 1 month study . Grampositive bacteria , Chlamydia trachomatis , Ureaplasmaurealyticum , mycoplasma hominis detect semen . Subjects addict drug，tobacco，or alcohol . Subjects heat , chemical , radioactive material , toxic contact history within year . Subjects treatment gonadotropin , anabolic steroid , chemotherapeutic drug , nonsteroidal antiinflammatory drug . Subjects combine cardiovascular , liver , kidney , hematopoietic system severe primary disease , mental disease . Subjects allergic uFSH allergy , treatment drug infertility . Subjects meet inclusion criterion , accord prescribed medication , unable judge efficacy , incomplete information , affect efficacy safety judgment . Subjects IHH patient
